item.title: Open World Games and the Myth of Sisyphus
item.description: Dedicated to the memory of Kevin Conroy. There was only ever one true Batman. You have been playing for months. Slowly and steadily, you have harvested every collectable - making yourself stronger and stronger until you can kill the toughest enemies. Every enemy defeated, every monster slain. No side quest remains which is worth doing. Those which are not worth doing are also done, because you are a completionist (which is a dignified way of saying that you have no life).
